p: The fraction 12 from DCCC, the more active fraction in the nitrite assay, containing a complex mixture of flavonoids and polyphenol components, was first further purified by Sephadex Â® LH-20 and then by reversed phase HPLC to afford rosmarinic acid ( 6), methyl rosmarinate ( 7), 8-hydroxycirsimaritin (also named isothymusin) ( 8), thymusin ( 9), luteolin ( 10) and apigenin ( 11) ( Figure 3). The structure of the known compounds was elucidated by comparison of the spectral data with those reported in the literature.
